actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 101-248, by Mr. Derrick.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 3299 with 6 hours of general debate. All points of order against consideration of the bill shall be waived. After general debate, the Committee of the Whole shall rise without motion. Measure will be read by title. Specified amendments are in order.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 55.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 316 - 109 (Roll no. 246).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3299) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to section 5 of the concurrent resolution on the budget for the fiscal year 1990.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3299 (budget reconciliation).

titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3299) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to section 5 of the concurrent resolution on the budget for the fiscal year 1990.
